channel.title: How to change magic delay timer
channel.description:
Well i want to change magic delay timer on ice blitz and ice abrrage cause you need to wait like 2 seconde to do it again so when your fighting your opposen you cannot do magic speel on him while hiting him with a weapon, you still need to move around wait a sec then use spell on it then continue your combat..
So here a video to show you.. http://tinypic.com/r/2cgzxat/6
